      public void drawCircle(int centerX, int centerY, int radius)
      Draws a circle with center at centerX, centerX with radius.
      Parameters:
      centerX - the x coordinate of the center
      centerY - the y coordinate of the center
      radius - the radius of the circle

    • addGrid

      public void addGrid(int increments)
      Overlays a grid in reflex blue color. The gridlines will be added at increments specified in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      increments - How frequently to draw a grid line

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(String filename)
      Saves the current image to a file given by filename in SVG format.
      Parameters:
      filename - String representing the filename to save to.
